**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is and how to reproduce it.

**Logs & Diagnostics**
If possible please include the diagnostics along with any logs.
The diagnostics are available from Settings, Integrations, Hive Local Thermostat, click on the device and the click download diagnostics in the top right panel.
